actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the exclusion from gross income for income from discharge of qualified real property business indebtedness.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore the exclusion from gross income for income from the discharge of qualified real property business indebtedness.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the exclusion from gross income for income from discharge of qualified real property business indebtedness.
